Package budget

Class FileRead

java.lang.Object
budget.FileRead
public class FileRead
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FileRead()
    This method checks if the files that will be used already exists, if they exists, dont do anything but, if they doesn't exists, creates the file and directory

    Method to substract the spented money from the file, and register the final result

    • FileRead

      public FileRead()
      This method checks if the files that will be used already exists, if they exists, dont do anything but, if they doesn't exists, creates the file and directory

  • Method Details

    • pay

      public float pay​(java.lang.String payment)
      Parameters:
      payment - . The parameter is the money payed or gained introduced in the jTextArea
      Returns:
      The final balance, that will be saved in the file and displayed in the Window

    • spent

      public float spent​(java.lang.String spented)
      Method to substract the spented money from the file, and register the final result
      Parameters:
      spented - . The parameter is the money spent introduced in the jTextArea
      Returns:
      The final balance, that will be saved in the file and displayed in the Window

    • registerHistory

      public void registerHistory​(float finalBalance, java.lang.String quantity, java.lang.String payOrSpent)
      Method to register the actions maded in the file "History"
      Parameters:
      finalBalance - . The balance geted of substract or add
      quantity - . The quantity of money spented or gained
      payOrSpent - . Shows if the method who called this method was "pay" or "spent"

    • getFinalBalance

      public float getFinalBalance()
      Method to get the value of the balance registered in the file
      Returns:
      Returns the balance registered in the file
